original_text: For as in those days before the flood they were eating and drinking, marrying and giving in marriage, until the day when Noah entered the ark,
korean_text: 홍수 전에 노아가 방주에 들어가던 날까지 사람들이 먹고 마시고 장가 들고 시집 가고 있으면서

sentences.original_text: For as in those days before the flood
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 홍수가 나기 전 그 날들과 같아서,

sentences.original_text: until the day when Noah entered the ark,
